definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: LXX )Iwsafaq, )Iwsafat (´[[י]] hath judged, cf. [[אֱלִישָׁפָט]], [[שְׁפַטְיׇהוּ]]& reff.)—
father of Jehu king of Israel 2Ki 9:2, 2Ki 9:14. †
chronicler under David & Solomon, son of Ahilud 2Sa 8:16, 1Ki 4:3, 1Ch 18:15; also 2Sa 20:24 (LXXL Safan). †
one of Sol.'s 12 officers who provided victuals for the royal household 1Ki 4:17 (LXXL )Iwasafat). †
´[[יוֹ]] a priest & trumpeter in David's time 1Ch 15:24. †

definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: [[עֵמֶק יְהוֹשָׁפָט]] Joe 3:2, Joe 3:12, symbolical name of a valley near Jerusalem, place of ultimate judgement.
